statements: SELECT * FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE data_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing GROUP BY id, location;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND data_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT location, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM real_time_data_processing_in_5G_edge_computing GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM realtime_data_processing;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM realtime_data_processing ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data, id FROM realtime_data_processing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM edge_computing WHERE edge_location LIKE 'US%';
SELECT edge_location, latency_ms FROM edge_computing ORDER BY latency_ms ASC;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM realtime_data_processing WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM edge_computing WHERE edge_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY latency_ms
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM realtime_data_processing JOIN edge_computing ON realtime_data_processing.id = edge_computing.edge_id WHERE edge_location = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM realtime_data_processing WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND data LIKE '%important%'
SELECT edge_id, edge_location, latency_ms FROM edge_computing WHERE latency_ms > 100 ORDER BY edge_id ASC
SELECT * FROM real_time_data;
SELECT id, data_record->>'time_stamp' AS timestamp FROM real_time_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM edge_devices WHERE device_name = 'Sensor1';
SELECT * FROM processed_data WHERE processing_task = 'Normalization' ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT process_id, result_data->>'average_value' AS average_value FROM processed_data WHERE result_data->>'status' = 'complete';
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT process_id, processing_task FROM processed_data WHERE processing_task ILIKE 'data processing%' AND process_id IN ('1c010b16-cacb-4ffa-8cde-0c2017c057f8', '3c72d10c-47c9-4d92-b139-3897bd68d7bc');
SELECT jsonb_array_length(data_record) AS num_records FROM real_time_data;
SELECT ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM edge_devices WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(-73.985428 40.748817)', 100);
SELECT * FROM 5g_edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, status FROM 5g_edge_devices WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT device_id, location FROM 5g_edge_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM latency_metrics WHERE latency_value > 10;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM 5g_edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM 5g_edge_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM processing_tasks WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(latency_value) AS avg_latency FROM latency_metrics GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(latency_value) > 10;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE message_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM edge_devices WHERE device_name = 'Device1';
SELECT stream_id, timestamp FROM data_streams ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM computations WHERE computation_type = 'Type1';
SELECT server_name, location FROM edge_servers ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM edge_devices WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM data_streams;
SELECT s.server_name, l.log_message FROM edge_servers s JOIN server_logs l ON s.server_id = l.server_id;
SELECT c.computation_id, c.computation_type, d.stream_data FROM computations c JOIN data_streams d ON c.stream_id = d.stream_id;
